data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hippa, Heikki, Mattsson, Ingegerd, Vilkamaa, Pekka (2005): New taxa of the Lygistorrhinidae (Diptera: Sciaroidea) and their implications for a phylogenetic analysis of the family. Zootaxa 960: 1-34, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.171227
